response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to both us and you, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a substantial discount from its market value, making it an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire this high-quality asset at a highly favorable rate. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
